channel.title: Sketch - Circles on The CAD Coder
channel.description: Recent content in Sketch - Circles on The CAD Coder

item.title: Solidworks Macro - Create Circle
item.description:
In this post, I tell you about how to create Circle through Solidworks VBA Macros in a sketch.

The process is almost identical with previous Solidworks Sketch Macros - Create Line post.

item.title: Solidworks Macro - Create Circle By Radius
item.description: In this post, I tell you about how to create Circle By Radius through Solidworks VBA Macros in a sketch.

item.title: Solidworks Macro - Create Perimeter Circle
item.description:
In this post, I tell you about how to create Perimeter Circle through Solidworks VBA Macros in a sketch.

The process is identical with previous Solidworks Sketch Macros - Create Circle post.
